faqs.a: Seminars are meant to clarify fundamentals of service provisioning in today’s time. We made the decision of making it free so that we can create a mass awareness of changing trends and the need for professionalism

We have to spend a lot of resources in conducting these Seminars & Workshops, so to keep the rollers running we need to charge for the workshops. Currently we are conducting workshops in Mumbai, Navi Mumbai & Thane, soon it will be started in multiple cities.

faqs.q: I am already working as a Real Estate Agent, Insurance Agent and Travel Agent since long. How is it going to help me?
faqs.a: If you are associated with service Industry, you know since few years the competition is increasing and the customer is too demanding. So in this changing scenario to understand how you can better survive and grow among your competitors is very important. Also you need to understand how the revenue can be increased with less efforts and less money investment

faqs.q: I am a budding entrepreneur looking for a good break, will it help me?
faqs.a: This workshop will be very good for you as you will be able to ‘better’ handle customer which will increase your productivity and lead to more sales from beginning of your career

faqs.q: Can I know more about the Seminar or Workshop?
faqs.a: It will be difficult to tell you more over the phone or through the web, it is better if you attend it, it will surely help you to increase productivity, sales & revenue

faqs.q: It is very difficult to attend since the venue is too far or taking out 4 hours for Seminar is tough?
faqs.a: To improve the productivity and to learn something you need to pay big monies otherwise, but here you are getting it for FREE. So if you wish to increase your sales and want to understand what today’s buyer wants, you need to come once. Only then can you know how you can grow faster and that too with less efforts and investment
